BEKB.BR.summary: NV Bekaert SA provides steel wire transformation and coating technologies worldwide. The company offers automotive products, such as exhaust systems, steering systems, interior seat, interior door, interior and exterior products, exterior (windscreen), drive train, corner products, and exterior bumpers; roads and bridges, elevator, building industry, heating, and perimeter fencing products, as well as concrete, masonry, plaster, and environment reinforcement products; and alternative energy, steel cord reinforced thermoplastic and rubber tapes, oil platform, power & telecom cables, flexible pipes, and specialities. It also provides domestic, sports and leisure, textiles, paper goods, and medical products; textile and transport products, as well as paper, glass, and plastic materials; and textile machinery, tools, machine constructions, brush wires, and engineering products. The company serves automotive, construction, energy and utility, agriculture, consumer goods, basic materials, and equipment industries. NV Bekaert SA was founded in 1880 and is headquartered in Zwevegem, Belgium.
